message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I want to make sure I'm getting a good deal. Can you meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $85 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $90.  This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $90 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $85 and $90. Can you do $87.50?
Bob, I appreciate your negotiation skills, but I need to be firm.  I can do $88. This is my final offer, as it's the lowest I can go and still make it worth my while.
Hi Alice, I understand that you're firm on your price, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to go up to $86, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
